activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7510
activity.text:
Hi @rithviknishad @NNSiri 
Feature Request: Enhanced Filtering for Users

Problem Statement: Currently, in the Users section under Advanced Filters, there is no option to select specific Talukas, which limits our ability to efficiently manage and scale operations across Taluka Hospitals in Karnataka.

Proposed Solution: We request the implementation of a feature that allows users to filter based on Taluka. This would greatly benefit our organization as we expand our presence and operations within Karnataka.

Benefits:

Efficiency: Enables us to quickly identify and manage users associated with specific Talukas.
Scalability: Supports our growth strategy by facilitating management across multiple Taluka Hospitals.
Accuracy: Ensures precise user targeting and management within designated geographic areas.
Alternative Consideration: While we await this feature implementation, a temporary workaround could involve manually sorting and categorizing users based on Taluka information provided in their profiles. However, this manual approach is time-consuming and prone to errors, highlighting the necessity of an automated filtering feature.

Thank you for considering my feature request. I believe that this enhancement will significantly improve our workflow and contribute to the overall effectiveness of the platform.
